name: ssinss2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl5eqss(cin(c0, c1), c2, cin(c1, c0), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, wss(cin(c1, c0), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, c0))
-| wi(w0, wss(cin(c1, c0), c2))

|- wi(w0, wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(cin(c1, c0), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cin(c1, c0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))

comment: Intersection preserves subclass relationship. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
